metadata.title: CVE-2019-7350 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Session fixation exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, as an attacker canfixate his own session cookies to the next logged-in user, therebyhijacking the victim's account. This occurs because a set of multiplecookies (between 3 and 5) is being generated when a user successfully logsin, and these sets overlap for successive logins.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
